vlibtour.vlibtour_client_scenario.map_viewer

Class MapHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • vlibtour.vlibtour_client_scenario.map_viewer.MapHelper

  • public final class MapHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains some utility methods for displaying POIs and tourists on a Open Street Map.
    Author:
    Chantal Taconet, Denis Conan

      • createMapWithCenterAndZoomLevel

        public static BasicMap createMapWithCenterAndZoomLevel(double latitude,
                                                       double longitude,
                                                       int zoomLevel)
                                                throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        initialises the map: map viewer, and display position with the centre and the zoom level.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude of the centre of the map.
        longitude - the longitude of the centre of the map.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level.
        Returns:
        the new map.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - pb in the file URL

      • addMarkerDotOnMap

        public static org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapMarkerDot addMarkerDotOnMap(BasicMap map,
                                                                              double latitude,
                                                                              double longitude,
                                                                              java.awt.Color color,
                                                                              java.awt.Font font,
                                                                              java.lang.String name)
        adds a marker dot on the map.
        Parameters:
        map - the map.
        latitude - the latitude of the marker dot.
        longitude - the longitude of the marker dot.
        color - the color of the text.
        font - the font of the text.
        name - the name of the marker dot that is also the text.
        Returns:
        the new marker dot.

      • addTouristOnMap

        public static org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapMarkerDot addTouristOnMap(BasicMap map,
                                                                            java.awt.Color color,
                                                                            java.awt.Font font,
                                                                            java.lang.String name,
                                                                            vlibtour.vlibtour_visit_emulation.Position position)
        adds a tourist on the map.
        Parameters:
        map - the map.
        color - the color of the name of the tourist on the map.
        font - the font of the map.
        name - the name of the tourist that is used to search for the position and is also used for the text of the marker dot on the map.
        position - the initial position.
        Returns:
        the new marker dot.

      • moveTouristOnMap

        public static void moveTouristOnMap(org.openstreetmap.gui.jmapviewer.MapMarkerDot dot,
                                    vlibtour.vlibtour_visit_emulation.Position newPosition)
        moves the marker dot of the tourist on the map.

        Let us protect against bad input values: be silentâ€”i.e. don't paint.

        Parameters:
        dot - the marker dot of the tourist.
        newPosition - the new position to move to.
